mutants.code:
import string

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum()))
    return s != s[::-1]

mutants.original_line: s = ''.join(ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum())
mutants.mutated_line: s = 'MUTATED'.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum()))
mutants.code:
import string

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = 'MUTATED'.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum()))
    return s == s[::-1]

import string

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum()))
    return s == s[::+1]

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum()))
    return s == s[::-2]

def is_palindrome(s):

import string

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum()))
    return s == s[::--1]
